CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 5 reads: "12. Ace Furniture Company representatives, Larry Berlin, James Williams, Ernie Moses and Edward Hopkins happily pose in their booth"
TitMainTitle: Larry Berlin, James Williams, Ernie Moses, and Edward Hopkins standing in Ace Furniture Company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
